meanings.definition: A large rectangular piece of cotton or other fabric used as a covering on a bed.
meanings.sent1: The sheeting on the bed was soft and cozy.
meanings.sent2: She bought new sheeting for her bed to match the room decor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat turned the sheeting into a makeshift tent.
meanings.sent4: The sheeting of clouds covered the sky like a blanket.
meanings.sent5: The sheeting smelled of fresh laundry and comfort.

meanings.definition: A thin layer or coating of material.
meanings.sent1: The sheeting of ice made walking on the sidewalk dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The sheeting of paint on the wall was starting to peel.
meanings.sent3: The magician used a sheeting of fabric to perform a disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The sheeting of fog obscured the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The sheeting of dust on the furniture needed to be cleaned regularly.

meanings.definition: The act of covering or wrapping with a sheet.
meanings.sent1: The sheeting of the table with a cloth made it look elegant.
meanings.sent2: She did the sheeting of the gift with colorful wrapping paper.
meanings.sent3: The sheeting of the car with a tarp protected it from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The sheeting of snow outside made everything look magical.
meanings.sent5: The sheeting of paper around the fragile item kept it safe during shipping.
